name: Era Of Newborns
description:
Game Subject (English)
Battles between International Countries, began to harm the world. Pharmaceutical companies want to sell lots of medicine so they overtake and It was end of humanity. Therefore, pharmaceutical companies had created an unknown virus in 2028. This virus spread to the world and brought many diseases. People have learned that they have 20 years of life due to this disease. But they learned that newborns had immunity against this virus. They called people with immunity “Newborns”. Now in 2048, a new age for humanity had begun.Developing Features:
* Single Player Mode.
* Crafting System
* Dynamic Building System.
* Weapon and Attachment Upgrade System.
* Harvesting Systems (Wood,Stone,iron etc.)
* Wild Nature System (Animals,Artificial intelligence)
* Farming System
* Cooking Food System.
* Night Day Cyling and Season System.
* Hunger,Thirsty and All Userinterface Reneval
* Clothes,Armor and Wearable Systems.
* Multiplayer and Server Systems.

Note:We will continue to make continuous improvement and development in line with the feedback from you..
